person.persName: Thomas Jefferson Hardin (Owen County, Kentucky, merchant and soldier.)

body.p: Owen County, Kentucky, merchant and soldier. Son of Thomas Hardin and Rachel Hardin. Laborer in Owen County, Kentucky in 1850. Merchant in Owen County in 1860. Appointed as postmaster in Monterey, Owen County on July 15, 1862. Served in the 9th Regiment Kentucky Cavalry (U.S.A.) as captain from August 22, 1862 to August 21, 1863. Served in the 30th Kentucky Infantry (U.S.A.) as lieutenant adjutant from April 9, 1864 to April 18, 1865.
